values: （光、声等的）焦点；中心；中心点；关注点；重点；病灶；震中；震源；（眼睛或镜头的）焦距；调焦
集中（注意力、精力等）；聚焦于；调整…的焦距以看清；使（光线、声波等）汇聚；使成为关注焦点

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 焦点的，在焦点上的；灶的，病灶的
使集中在一点上；调节…的焦距

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指把人或物集中在一起，也可指把精力或注意力集中于某一事物上。
侧重指把光、热、射线等集中于一点，也可指把思想或精力等集中于某人或某事情上。

word_group.brief_definition: 重点关于, 侧重于, 专注于
离焦, 注意力不集中, 脱离视线
研究重点；研究焦点；研究热点
聚焦；集中注意力；集中注意
加强关注；注意力增加；更加重视
分组座谈会；焦点小组；典型群众

bilingual.source: The focus of this book is environmental protection.
bilingual.target: 这本书的焦点是环境保护。

bilingual.source: The discussion became tangential and lost focus.
bilingual.target: 讨论变得离题，失去了焦点。

bilingual.source: They decided to narrow down the focus of the discussion.
bilingual.target: 他们决定变窄讨论的焦点。

bilingual.source: Her speech became the focus of the entire event.
bilingual.target: 她的演讲成为了整个活动的焦点。

bilingual.source: He became the focus of the spotlight during his speech.
bilingual.target: 他在演讲中成为了追光的焦点。

bilingual.source: The camera's focus was off, causing the image to blur.
bilingual.target: 相机的焦点不对，导致图像模糊。

bilingual.source: The focus of the meeting was how to improve productivity.
bilingual.target: 会议的焦点是如何提高生产效率。

bilingual.source: The company created a focus group to gather customer feedback.
bilingual.target: 公司创建了一个焦点组来收集客户反馈。

bilingual.source: The majoy focus of the meeting was to discuss the new policy.
bilingual.target: 会议的主要焦点是讨论新政策。

bilingual.source: She wore a beautiful dress and became the focus of the party.
bilingual.target: 她穿着嫣然的礼服，成为了晚会的焦点。

list.abstract: focus（英[ˈfəʊkəs]，美[ˈfoʊkəs]），英语单词，作名词用，为重点；兴趣的焦点；焦点。作动词用，为重视；集中；聚焦。短语搭配有focus on（重点关于, 侧重于, 专注于），例句为“You just focus on the move.（你只需要专注于行动。）” focus名词类近义词有center、hub、fairness，及物动词类近义词有centralize，不及物动词类近义词有concentrate、band，反义词为blur，focused是focus的过去式和过去分词形式。

福特福克斯，基于福特全新中级车平台打造，以动力总成技术、赛车级的底盘调校、时尚运动的外观设计、以及智能科技闻名。2005年，福特福克斯进入中国。2019年7月11日，长安福特2020款福特福克斯正式上市，2020款福特福克斯主要在外观细节上有所调整，不同车型的配置也进行了升级，此外还满足国六排放标准。2022年6月25日，全新福特福克斯在重庆车展精彩上市，厂商指导价11.98万元至14.58万元。推出4款车型，提供三厢和两厢版本，搭配6款高燃车色。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll hire a PR firm, using a focus group to find the right words.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要雇佣一家公关公司，让焦点小组讨论出合适的措辞。

yingyinNormal.en: A lot. Yeah. Focus, Troy, come on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多。对，集中精力， 特洛伊，来。

yingyinNormal.en: It's easy to focus on what separates us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很容易去关注把我们区分开来的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a short list. Great. I like it. Focus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那清单非常短。很好，我喜欢，讲重点。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: Let me focus on that last one for a minute.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要重点说说最后一项。

yingyinNormal.en: Where was I? Where were you? Can we focus, please?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当时在哪里？我们不要跑题，行不行？

yingyinNormal.en: Shao Lin's legacy is monastic dedication and focus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 少林的遗产是奉献和专注。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, okay. Can we just focus on the asset, please?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，好吧，我们能把重点放在资产上吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, now Whittaker's gonna focus on swing states, fundraising...
yingyinNormal.zh: 惠特克会关注摇摆州，筹款……

yingyinNormal.en: The future world, business will not focus on the size, business will not focus on standardization and power, they will focus on the flexibility, nimbleness, customization and user-friendliness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 未来的世界，企业将不再会关注于规模，企业不再会关注于标准化和权力，他们会关注于灵活性、敏捷性、个性化和用户友好。

yingyinNormal.en: There's way too much input, so they just kinda help me focus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接收的信息实在太多，所以戴那个能帮我集中注意。

yingyinNormal.en: The only thing we need to do is make this Kim kid lose his focus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们唯一要做的是让这个小孩的关注点发生偏移。

yingyinNormal.en: Not bad. Thank you for that analysis. Now, let's just focus on you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错嘛。感谢你的分析，现在，聊聊你吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait, wait. What? Cocoa, Leonard. Focus. I'm down in the dumps here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，等等，什么？可可，莱纳德，集中精力，我现在很郁闷。

yingyinNormal.en: I love teaching math, but that would be my dream job. What's his focus?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很喜欢教数学，不过那才是我梦寐以求的工作，他的研究方向是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: In the meantime, my focus is to help the Russians in any way that I can.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与此同时，我主要要尽我所能帮助俄国人。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe it's best to lower our sights, hunker down and focus on planet Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许降低我们的眼光，蹲下来专注于地球最好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ok. I can do this and focus on my notes. What did I have written down again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，我可以的，只要注意讲稿就好,我到底写了什么？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: And also I strongly believe(believe in) the future world, we are going to have a lot of women leaders, because in the future people will not only focus on muscles, powers, they(they will also) focus on wisdom, theythey(they will also) focus on careness and responsibility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且我强烈相信，在未来的世界，我们会有很多女性领袖，因为在未来人们将不会只关注在肌肉力量，而会更加重视智慧，重视关怀和责任。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, over time, I was able to check myself And kind of get my focus back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但随着时间流逝，我会反思自己，找回我对神的专注

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 重点关注；侧重于；专注于

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不聚焦的；目光茫然的；模糊的；不形成焦点的；不调焦的；不能使入射线集中于一点的；不清晰的；无特定目标的
v. 使…重新聚焦；使…重新对准；改变（注意力的）重点；改变（资源的）使用范围

word_family.mean: n. 重点；兴趣的焦点；图像（成像）清晰度；焦点；重视；震源；震中；病灶

sense_info_list.en: an act of concentrating interest or activity on something

examination_example.sentence: Major social issues should be the <highlight>focus</highlight> of legislation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重大的社会问题应该成为立法的重点。

examination_example.sentence: Our <highlight>focus</highlight> should be shifted to community welfare.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的重点应该转移到社区福利上。

examination_example.sentence: Cal Newport recommends building a habit of "deep work"—the ability to <highlight>focus</highlight> without distraction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 卡尔·纽波特建议养成一种“深度工作”的习惯，即不受干扰地集中注意力的能力。

examination_example.sentence: If you are surrounded by problems and cannot stop thinking about the past, try to <highlight>focus</highlight> on the present moment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你被问题包围，无法停止对过去的思考，试着专注于当下。

sense_info_list.en: the state or quality of having or producing clear visual definition

exam_freq_info.chinese: 重点; 关注的中心; 关注

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 重点关于；侧重于；专注于

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不聚焦的；目光茫然的；模糊的；不形成焦点的；不调焦的；不能使入射线集中于一点的；不清晰的；无特定目标的

word_family.mean: n. 重点；兴趣的焦点；图像（成像）清晰度；焦点；重视；震源；震中；病灶

sense_info_list.en: an act of concentrating interest or activity on something
sense_info_list.zh: 重点; 关注的中心; 关注

examination_example.sentence: Ego aside, a third advantage is that the emotional neutrality of indifferent relationships has been found to strengthen one's <highlight>focus</highlight> on task resolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 抛开自我不谈，“冷漠关系”的第三个好处是这一关系中的情感中立可以提高一个人在解决问题上的注意力。

examination_example.sentence: For now, the U.S. government is more <highlight>focused</highlight> on preventing new debris from forming than taking the trash out of orbit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，与将垃圾带出轨道相比，美国政府更注重防止新碎片的形成。

examination_example.sentence: Officials at the White House announced a new space policy <highlight>focused</highlight> on managing the increasing number of satellites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白宫官员宣布了一项新的太空政策，着重于管理不断增加的卫星数量。

examination_example.sentence: Moving away from a <highlight>focus</highlight> on laboratory studies with undergraduate participants towards more complex, real-world situations studied with more diverse groups of people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从专注于与本科生一起进行的实验室研究转向由更多人群研究的更加复杂，真实的情况。

examination_example.sentence: Surfing the Internet during class doesn't just steal <highlight>focus</highlight> from the educator; it also hurts students who're already struggling to grasp the material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在课堂上网上冲浪不仅会窃取教育者的注意力; 它还伤害了那些已经在努力掌握学习材料的学生。

sense_info_list.en: the state or quality of having or producing clear visual definition

examination_example.sentence: For turning their <highlight>focus</highlight> to the needs of farmers in poorer countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将重点转向较贫穷国家农民的需求。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays, children are the <highlight>focus</highlight> of many families, shouldering the hope of their parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，儿童是许多家庭的焦点，肩负着父母的希望。

examination_example.sentence: However, our <highlight>focus</highlight> on countries can mask broad variations within them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我们对国家的关注可能掩盖了国家内部的广泛差异。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指把人或物集中在一起, 也可指把精力或注意力集中于某一事物上。
侧重指把光、热、射线等集中于一点, 也可指把思想或精力等集中于某人或某事情上。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 重点; 关注的中心; 关注

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 重点；兴趣的焦点；图像（成像）清晰度；焦点；重视；震源；震中；病灶

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 重点关于；侧重于；专注于

sense_info_list.en: an act of concentrating interest or activity on something
sense_info_list.zh: 重点; 关注的中心; 关注

examination_example.sentence: What's happened is that our <highlight>focus</highlight> on creating that quality of life first has enabled the residents to live here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的重点在于首先打造生活品质，这已使得居民来此定居。

examination_example.sentence: In one the <highlight>focus</highlight> could be on building financial success and personal achievement, in another on creating a better work/life balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 某个阶段的目标可能是获得财富成就和个人成就，另一个阶段的目标可能是更好地平衡工作与生活。

examination_example.sentence: Though Chasin says the <highlight>focus</highlight> of the work is on the activity of writing, rather than the text that ends up getting written, some of the work that comes out of the sessions has stuck with her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查辛表示，尽管活动的重点在于“写”，并没有要求一定要写完一整篇文章，但这段时间写出的许多作品都给她留下了深刻的印象。

examination_example.sentence: We believe that to <highlight>focus</highlight> on longevity as primarily an issue of aging is to miss its full implications.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们认为，如果把长寿主要作为一个老龄化问题来关注，就会忽略其全部影响。

examination_example.sentence: He became one of the first modern chefs to <highlight>focus</highlight> on the appearance of his table, not just the flavor of his dishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他成为首批专注于外观而不只是菜肴风味的现代厨师之一。

examination_example.sentence: Research in my lab has <highlight>focused</highlight> on how food becomes contaminated, and we've done some work on this particular piece of wisdom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的实验室的研究集中在食物如何被污染的问题上，我们在这一特殊的学问方面已经做了一些工作。

examination_example.sentence: The ships had nine decks, and White Star Line decided to <highlight>focus</highlight> on making them the most luxurious ships on the water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些船有九层甲板，白星航运决定专注于把它们打造成海上最豪华的船。

examination_example.sentence: With his letter, Aderhold inserted West Windsor-Plainsboro Regional School District into a national discussion about the intense <highlight>focus</highlight> on achievement at elite schools, and whether it has gone too far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过阿德霍尔德的这封信，西温莎-普莱斯伯勒地区学区加入到了一场关于精英学校过分重视学业成绩的全国性讨论。讨论还谈及这些学校是否为了取得好成绩而做得有些过头了。

sense_info_list.en: the state or quality of having or producing clear visual definition

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Focus</highlight> on the most important ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关注最重要的。

examination_example.sentence: These experts argue that <highlight>focusing</highlight> on wage is the wrong approach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些专家认为关注工资是错误的方法。

examination_example.sentence: According to the same study, efforts to reduce consumption should <highlight>focus</highlight> on improving consumer awareness and behaviour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据同一项研究，减少微波炉用电的努力应聚焦于提高消费者意识、改善其消费行为。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指把人或物集中在一起，也可指把精力或注意力集中于某一事物上。
侧重指把光、热、射线等集中于一点，也可指把思想或精力等集中于某人或某事情上。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 重点；兴趣的焦点；图像（成像）清晰度；焦点；重视；震源；震中；病灶

sense_info_list.en: an act of concentrating interest or activity on something

examination_example.sentence: Emotional intelligence, with its <highlight>focus</highlight> on both head and heart, may serve to point us in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情商既关注头脑，也关注内心，可能会为我们指明正确的方向。

examination_example.sentence: You will want to continue to <highlight>focus</highlight> on positive choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会想要继续关注积极的选项。

examination_example.sentence: We were respectful of craft (技艺) and <highlight>focused</highlight> on digging into the characters we were going to play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们尊重技艺，专注于挖掘我们要扮演的角色。

sense_info_list.en: the state or quality of having or producing clear visual definition

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指把人或物集中在一起，也可指把精力或注意力集中于某一事物上。
侧重指把光、热、射线等集中于一点，也可指把思想或精力等集中于某人或某事情上。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使…重新聚焦；使…重新对准；改变（注意力的）重点；改变（资源的）使用范围

word_family.mean: n. 重点；兴趣的焦点；图像（成像）清晰度；焦点；重视；震源；震中；病灶

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 重点关于，侧重于，专注于

sense_info_list.en: an act of concentrating interest or activity on something

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Focus</highlight> the good things you have already been doing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专注于你已经在做的好事。

examination_example.sentence: For him, the quiet night was a valuable time to <highlight>focus</highlight> on translation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他来说，安静的夜晚是专注翻译的宝贵时间。

examination_example.sentence: Do you need silence to <highlight>focus</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你需要沉默来集中注意力吗？

sense_info_list.en: the state or quality of having or producing clear visual definition

examination_example.sentence: A curved mirror <highlight>focuses</highlight> visible light to one point.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个曲面镜将可见光聚焦到一个点。
